data.title: Tier 1
data.description: Critical Source of Truth business data assets of an organization

contents.text: Used in critical metrics and dashboards to drive business and product decisions
Used in critical compliance reporting to regulators, govt entities, and third party
Used in brand or revenue impacting online user-facing experiences (search results, advertisement, promotions, experimentation)
Other high impact use, such as ML models, fraud detection, and brand affecting use cases
Source used to derive other critical Tier-1 datasets

data.title: Tier 2
data.description: Important business datasets for your company (not as critical as Tier 1)

contents.text: Used in important business metrics, product metrics, and dashboards to drive internal decisions
Used in important compliance reporting to major regulators, govt entities, and third party
Used for less critical online user-facing experiences (user activity, user behavior)
Source used to derive other critical Tier-2 datasets

data.title: Tier 3
data.description: Department/group level datasets that are typically non-business and general internal system

contents.text: Used in product metrics, and dashboards to drive product decisions
Used to track operational metrics of internal systems
Source used to derive other critical Tier-3 datasets

data.title: Tier 4
data.description: Team level datasets that are typically non-business and general internal system

contents.text: Used in product metrics, and dashboards to drive team decisions
Used to track operational metrics of internal systems owned by the team
Source used to derive other critical Tier-4 datasets

data.title: Tier 5
data.description: Private/Unused data assets - No impact beyond individual users

contents.text: Data assets without any ownership with no usage in the last 60 days
Data assets owned by individuals without team ownership
